itinerary.title: Arrival and Dhow Cruise
itinerary.description: Arrive in Dubai, check in, and enjoy a relaxing dinner cruise on a traditional dhow.

itinerary.title: City Tour and Burj Khalifa
itinerary.description: Explore the city's landmarks and enjoy panoramic views from the top of the Burj Khalifa.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari
itinerary.description: Experience a thrilling desert safari with dune bashing, camel rides, and a traditional Bedouin dinner.
